Package edu.bu.pas.tetris.nn.optimizers

Class AdamOptimizer

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.tetris.nn.Optimizer
edu.bu.pas.tetris.nn.optimizers.AdamOptimizer
public class AdamOptimizer extends Optimizer
An Optimizer which updates parameters according to the vanilla optimization step: theta_i = theta_i - lr * theta.grad If enabled, this Optimizer will clip gradients to be within a specified range (to encourage numerical stability). In this case, the step will look like: theta_i = theta_i - lr * clip(theta.grad, minVal, maxVal)

  • Constructor Details

    • AdamOptimizer

      public AdamOptimizer(List<Parameter> parameters, double lr, double beta1, double beta2)
      The constructor. This constructor initializes the Optimizer with the Parameters this Optimizer is optimizing and the learning rate to use. This Optimizer will do no gradient clipping.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the List of Parameters
      lr - The learning rate

    • AdamOptimizer

      public AdamOptimizer(List<Parameter> parameters, double lr, double beta1, double beta2, double clipValue)
      The constructor. This constructor initializes the Optimizer with the Parameters this Optimizer is optimizing and the learning rate to use. This Optimizer performs gradient clipping symmetrically around the value provided.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the List of Parameters
      lr - The learning rate
      clipValue - the range to clip. Gradients will be clipped to the range [-clipValue, clipValue]

    • AdamOptimizer

      public AdamOptimizer(List<Parameter> parameters, double lr, double beta1, double beta2, double lClipValue, double rClipValue)
      The constructor. This constructor initializes the Optimizer with the Parameters this Optimizer is optimizing and the learning rate to use. This Optimizer performs gradient clipping around the arbitrary interval provided.
      Parameters:
      parameters - the List of Parameters
      lr - The learning rate
      lClipValue - the minimum value to allow (clip if lower than)
      rCliplValue - the maximum value to allow (clip if larger than)

    • step

      public void step() throws Exception
      A method for performing a single optimization step (i.e. ajusting each Parameter once) This update behaves according to the vanilla optimization step: theta_i = theta_i - lr * theta.grad If enabled, this Optimizer will clip gradients to be within a specified range (to encourage numerical stability). In this case, the step will look like: theta_i = theta_i - lr * clip(theta.grad, minVal, maxVal)
      Specified by:
      step in class Optimizer
      Throws:
      Exception
